definitions.definition: To make sure or certain of something ( usually some future event or condition).
examples: I use an alarm clock to ensure that I get up on time.

definitions.definition: To make a pledge to (someone); to promise , guarantee (someone of something); to assure .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To make sure or certain of something ( usually some future event or condition). [from 18th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , obsolete ) To make a pledge to (someone); to promise , guarantee (someone of something); to assure . [14th–18th c.]
